nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_772_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: She came up with a new idea for increasing sales.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_773_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: It makes sense to buy the most up-to-date version.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_774_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: If the day turns out to be wet, we may have to change our plans.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_775_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Upon reflection, she decided to accept his offer.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_776_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: For the sake of a successful exhibition we should try our best to collect more famous paintings.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_777_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: We reserved two tickets in the name of Brown.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_778_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: We had to resign ourselves to taking a loss on the sale.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_779_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Economic and social inequalities can never be viewed as positive and constructive forces.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_780_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: If he did move to Beijing, he'd stand a chance of getting a job.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_781_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: These policemen are frightened at the prospect that they face a population which has the most advanced automatic arms at its disposal.
